title: Create a license metric record
content:
1. From the main menu, select Run > Software Asset > License Metrics.

  2. Click New.

  3. In the New License Metric dialog box, enter all requested information.
    Field Description
    Display label External (common) name of the license metric.
    Code Code for the license metric.
    Description Description of the license metric.
    Publisher Publisher of the license metric.
    Parent Parent license metric.

  4. Click Save.

Related topics

  • License metrics
  • How to edit a license metric record
  • How to retire a license metric record
